#summary A Plugin to allow you to "Tab" between the attributes (and their values) contained within a html or xml tag.

= This Plugin Has Moved =

This plugin and it's source have moved to github.

The new address for this plugin is [https://github.com/RoryBecker/CR_AttributeTabber https://github.com/RoryBecker/CR_AttributeTabber]

The latest release [https://github.com/RoryBecker/CR_AttributeTabber/releases/latest can be found here] 

=== Introduction ===

This plugin allows you to use those Tab to Next Reference skillz to navigate between the attributes of a HTML or XML tag (including their values)

http://dxcorecommunityplugins.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/CR_AttributeTabber/Screenshots/CR_AttributeTabber.gif 

=== Usage ===
Simply place your caret on an HTML\XML Attribute, and hit either Tab or Shift+Tab to navigate as usual.
